description: Land surface model simulation. Same as land-hist except with wood harvest maintained at 1850 amounts/areas.  Start year either 1850 or 1700 depending on standard practice for particular model.
long_name: historical land-only with no wood harvest
rationale: To assess the relative impact of land cover and incremental land management change on fluxes of water, energy, and carbon in combination with other LUMIP land experiments.

requirements.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
requirements.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

requirements.description: Apply Global Soil Wetness Project phase three (GSWP3) forcing data for offline land surface models running the LS3MIP historical simulation land-hist is provided by the LS3MIP.
requirements.label: Historical GSWP3 Meteorological Forcing

requirements.canonical_name: Historical land use except with 1850 wood harvest
requirements.description: Historical land use except maintain 1850 wood harvest amounts/areas. Wood harvest due to land deforestation for agriculture should continue yielding non-zero anthropogenic product pools.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, historical land use, pre-industrial wood harvest
requirements.label: Historical land use except with 1850 wood harvest

requirements.description: Apply all transient historical forcings that are relevant for the land surface model. Include transient CO2, Nitrogen deposition, aerosol deposition and population density etc.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, historical, land surface forcing, all forcings
requirements.label: All historical land surface forcings

requirements.description: All applicable land management active in the land surface model configuration.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, all land management, Grassland, Fire, Wood Harvest, Pasture, Crop, Irrigation, Fertilisation
requirements.label: All Land Management Active
